name: Taco Zucchini Boats
description: Looking for a healthy & delicious recipe to use up your summer zucchini bounty? Look no further! These taco-filled zucchini boats are filled with warm Taco Filling and topped with melty cheese. If you’re eating lower carb meals, this fits the bill and is still incredibly satisfying.

ingredients.name: medium zucchinis, cut in half lengthwise

preparation: Using the tip of a spoon, scrape out centers of zucchini halves, leaving 1⁄4” thick shell on each half. Chop and stir zucchini centres into taco filling; set aside.
Place zucchini shells in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 4 min, or just until tender.
Spread salsa in bottom of a large baking dish. Tuck in zucchini halves (they can touch).
Fill zucchini hollows with taco filling; press in to pack down. Sprinkle cheese on top.
Place dish on a Sheet Pan. Broil, rotating pan, until cheese evenly melts, 1–2 min. Garnish with toppings, if desired.
tips: Add a dollop of sour cream or Greek yogurt—they taste great with salsa!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens and veggies and 1⁄2 cup brown rice.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
